A letter huh? Last time I got pinched was through Cox Cable and it was an email. Before that the last time was in like 2004-2005 for downloading 50 first dates. I used Sharaza. Uninstalled that and called Cox, I told them I uninstalled the program and they said okay. The CSR told me that Cox doesn't give companies  account info because it's private and the only way that they would submit it is under a court order. I asked if that has ever happened and he said no.
so your point is? its okey??
The point is that you take a chance every time you download illegally.

I also heard of the three strike rule. Some providers will give you three strikes when it comes to downloading illegally. If you get caught 3 times, they will ban you from ever receiving internet service from their company under your name.
okey. but there aren't no stores here which sells movies from hollywood either, how the hell i'm suppose to watch movies? get a plane to usa everytime i want to watch one??
im gonna take a leap of faith.
